languages.text: "Когда долг стискивает сердце подобно железной клетке... Выберешь ли ты близость в неволе? Или прорвешься сквозь прутья на свободу, обломав при том крылья?"
"When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"
languages.original_text: "Когда долг стискивает сердце подобно железной клетке... Выберешь ли ты близость в неволе? Или прорвешься сквозь прутья на свободу, обломав при том крылья?"

traits.locale_text: "When your duty entraps your heart like an iron cage... Would you choose the intimacy in captivity? Or would you break through the cage and be free at the cost of your wings?"
"When your duty entraps your heart like an iron cage... Would you choose the intimacy in captivity? Or would you break through the cage and be free at the cost of your wings?"
"When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"
"When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"
"When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"

languages.text: “如果你肩负的职责如同捕兽夹般攫住了你的心……你会选择在这样的禁锢中维持亲密的关系，还是以折断翅膀为代价挣脱束缚，重获自由？”
languages.original_text: "When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"

traits.locale_text: “如果你肩负的职责如同捕兽夹般攫住了你的心……你会选择在这样的禁锢中维持亲密的关系，还是以折断翅膀为代价挣脱束缚，重获自由？”

languages.text: «Cuando el deber se cierra en torno a tu corazón como un cepo de hierro... ¿prefieres la intimidad en cautiverio? ¿O te zafas de la trampa y optas por la libertad, aunque para ello debas renunciar a tus alas?».
languages.original_text: "When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"

traits.locale_text: «Cuando el deber se cierra en torno a tu corazón como un cepo de hierro... ¿prefieres la intimidad en cautiverio? ¿O te zafas de la trampa y optas por la libertad, aunque para ello debas renunciar a tus alas?».

languages.text: « Quand le devoir enserre votre cœur comme un piège d'acier... choisirez-vous l'intimité dans la captivité ? Ou tenterez-vous de vous échapper en abandonnant vos ailes ? »
languages.original_text: "When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"

traits.locale_text: « Quand le devoir enserre votre cœur comme un piège d'acier... choisirez-vous l'intimité dans la captivité ? Ou tenterez-vous de vous échapper en abandonnant vos ailes ? »

languages.text: "Wenn die Pflicht Euer Herz fesselt wie eine eiserne Falle ... würdet Ihr Vertrautheit in Gefangenschaft wählen? Oder würdet Ihr die Falle aufbrechen, um frei zu sein, und Eure Flügel zurücklassen?"
languages.original_text: "When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"

traits.locale_text: "Wenn die Pflicht Euer Herz fesselt wie eine eiserne Falle ... würdet Ihr Vertrautheit in Gefangenschaft wählen? Oder würdet Ihr die Falle aufbrechen, um frei zu sein, und Eure Flügel zurücklassen?"

languages.text: 「義務が鉄の罠のように御身の心に迫るとき…陛下は束縛の中で親密さを選ぶでしょうか？それとも罠を破り、翼を捨てて自由になるのか？」
languages.original_text: "When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"

traits.locale_text: 「義務が鉄の罠のように御身の心に迫るとき…陛下は束縛の中で親密さを選ぶでしょうか？それとも罠を破り、翼を捨てて自由になるのか？」

languages.text: "Görev, yüreğini tuzağa düşürürse... Tutsaklıkta mahremiyeti mi seçersin yoksa kanatlarını ardında bırakıp o tuzaktan kurtularak özgür olmayı mı?"
languages.original_text: "When duty closes around your heart like an iron trap... would you choose intimacy in captivity? Or would you break out of the trap and be free, leaving your wings behind?"

traits.locale_text: "Görev yüreğini tuzağa düşürürse... Tutsaklıkta mahremiyeti mi seçersin yoksa kanatlarını ardında bırakıp o tuzaktan kurtularak özgür olmayı mı?"
